input.sentences: i went out for a night in the city .
there were may people out in downtown that night .
there were also many birds in the sky .
everyone had brought pillows with them .
they were having a giant pillow fight in the middle of the city .
output.sentences: We took a trip to Europe.
This trip took us to  a pillow fighting contest.
We found it because we found several feathers flying in the air.
Everyone appeared to be having so much fun.
At the end though the square was filled with feathers.
